title: Get rid of this PoS TeamBuilder and bring back Normal Draft.
body: I'm sick of vsing OPs and Hard Counters that I've accidentally blind-picked myself into. Team Builder queues are way too long and only attracts scrubs with god complexes.

replies.body: I also approve of Normal Draft Mode

For the love of Braum Riot, can we just have Draft Pick. I understand you are worried that no one will play this mode, but surely having a few weeks with Draft Pick weekends wouldn't be an issue right? The server has grown since before, and the community really wants this badly.

I'm beginning to feel like a rap-god, rap-god.....
